Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பிணியின்மை செல்வம் விளைவின்பம் ஏமம் அணியென்ப நாட்டிவ் வைந்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Freedom from epidemics, wealth, produce, happiness and protection (to subjects); these five, the learned, say, are the ornaments of a kingdom.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A beautiful, personified figure of a Nation is shown.
Layered_Composition.Midground: She is adorned with five magnificent jewels ('அணி'), each representing one of the five ornaments of a good country. A flawless pearl for Health ('பிணியின்மை'), a large diamond for Wealth ('செல்வம்'), a rich emerald for Produce ('விளைவு'), a radiant sunstone for Happiness ('இன்பம்'), and a strong shield-brooch for Security ('ஏமம்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The nation-figure stands proudly, her beauty and strength coming from these five essential adornments.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The five true ornaments of a nation are health, wealth, productivity, happiness, and security.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: Personifying the nation and representing the five qualities as her jewels is the central metaphor. Each jewel has a character that matches the quality it represents.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Adorned, prosperous, happy, healthy, secure, ideal.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A brilliant, celebratory light. Each of the five jewels glows with its own distinct, beautiful color, creating a radiant and harmonious effect.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A beautiful, regal portrait of the personified nation, focusing on her five jewels.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a high-fashion, haute couture aesthetic for the jewels and attire.

Cultural_Anchors: The Five Ornaments of a Nation ('நாட்டிற்கு அணி')

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: a sickly or poor figure, missing jewels, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the design of the five jewels.
